headline: Watch: Sarah Palin Says She’s Considering Running for Late Rep. Don Young’s Seat
author: Cassandra Fairbanks
sentences: (Tweet/Video) “Are you ready to announce a run for that seat?” Bolling asked.“Oh my goodness, think of those huge shoes that are to be filled when we consider Don Young’s longevity and his passion, his love, his fighting spirit for our wonderful state of Alaska and for the nation as a whole,” Palin said.
Appearing on Eric Bolling’s The Balance on Newsmax on Monday, Palin signaled that a campaign is not out of the question.
Former Alaska Governor Sarah Palin is considering running for the late Rep. Don Young’s seat, she announced on Monday.
Young passed away on Friday at 88-years-old.
